Hi, 

I am trying to narrow my crawl by allowing only css types of files t=
o be accepted. For this I am using the "NotMatchesFilePatternDecideRule" wi=
th the properties like :

  <bean class=3D"org.archive.modules.deciderules.=
NotMatchesFilePatternDecideRule">
      <property name=3D"decision" value=
=3D"REJECT" />
      <property name=3D"regex" value=3D".*(/|\.css)$" /> 
 <=
/bean>

with the other rules in this order , as on the manual :

   1. Reje=
ctDecideRule
   2. SurtPrefixedDecideRule
   3. TooManyHopsDecideRule
   4.=
 PathologicalPathDecideRule
   5. TooManyPathSegmentsDecideRule
   6. NotMa=
tchesFilePatternDecideRule
   7. PrerequisiteAcceptDecideRule

But I am get=
ting all types of files like pdf , images and not getting the css files . I=
 am not able to figure out where am I going wrong. Any help is greatly appr=
eciated.

Thanks.
